INTERSHOP IOM 5.0.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision 3616b265ba8faf0a9e39274f3c3c3c7c9fd07ea0)

Table oms.OrderValidationRuleDefDO (Enum)

Order validation rules that are supported from the application by default, e.g. check for article Ids.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id integer PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL  
name varchar(250) NOT_NULL This is more the description of the rule rather than a name. Do only use the "id" to refer a given rule. 
rank integer NOT_NULL Define the order (ranking) of the validations processing. 
mandatory boolean The mandatory rules are always processed, even when they are not mapped to the shop. 
description varchar  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY OrderValidationRuleDefDO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 

Enum Values
